original_text: So I am sad for Moab. I am crying for all their people. I weep for the people of Kir-Heres. 48: Kir-Heres had been the capital city of Moab. So I am sad for Moab. I am crying for all their people. I weep for the people of Kir-Heres. 48: Kir-Heres had been the capital city of Moab. So I am sad for Moab. I am crying for all their people.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 모압을 위하여 울며 온 모압을 위하여 부르짖으리니 무리가 길헤레스 사람을 위하여 신음하리로다

sentences.original_text: So I am sad for Moab.
I am crying for all their people.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들의 모든 백성을 위해 울고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: I weep for the people of Kir-Heres.
Kir-Heres had been the capital city of Moab.
So I am sad for Moab.
I am crying for all their people.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들의 모든 백성을 위해 울고 있습니다.
